original_title: Jammin': Jelly Roll Morton on Broadway
overview: A behind the scenes look at the Broadway production of Jelly's Last Jam, including a tribute to jazz musician and composer Jelly Roll Morton. Gregory Hines and George C. Wolfe, who wrote the book for Jelly's Last Jam, are interviewed. Includes scenes from the show.
tagline: A documentary on the making of the Broadway musical "Jelly's Last Jam."
title: Jammin': Jelly Roll Morton on Broadway
